definitions.definition: An independent town in the Upper Franconia region, Bavaria , Germany .
A rural district of the Upper Franconia region, Bavaria , surrounding but not including the town of Bamberg, which nevertheless serves as its administrative seat.
A city , the county seat of Bamberg County , South Carolina , United States .

secondary_definitions: An independent town in the Upper Franconia region, Bavaria , Germany .
A rural district of the Upper Franconia region, Bavaria , surrounding but not including the town of Bamberg, which nevertheless serves as its administrative seat.
A city , the county seat of Bamberg County , South Carolina , United States .
